word: Physical Exercise Needed-It is essential that every minister of the gospel should take physical exercise, and that every teacher and every student in our schools should cultivate their physical strength and live in such a way that disease shall not fasten upon them, so that the impression will go out that education is incompatible with good health.--Ms. 60, 1894, p. 6. ("Beneficent Action a Proof of Sincere Love," cir. 1894.)
